process.name: TCP4-2313 Verify Conversational with Gateways
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_5</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="Task 1" pm:screenRef="585" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_5</bpmn:incoming>

    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_5" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_6" name="Exclusive Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_14</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_6"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_9" name="Task 2" pm:screenRef="585" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_17</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_9">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">input == "Roma"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:task id="node_12" name="Task 3" pm:screenRef="585" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_14</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_21</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_14" name="" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_12">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">input != "Roma"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_15" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_17</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_17" name="" sourceRef="node_9" targetRef="node_15"/>
    <bpmn:inclusiveGateway id="node_19" name="Inclusive Gateway" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_21</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_26</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_28</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_30</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:inclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_21" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_19"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_22" name="Task 4" pm:screenRef="585" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_26</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_33</bpmn:outgoing>

      <bpmn:incoming>node_28</bpmn:incoming>

    <bpmn:task id="node_24" name="Task 6" pm:screenRef="585" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_30</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_37</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_26" name="" sourceRef="node_19" targetRef="node_22">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">selectlist.title == "La Leçon de ténèbres"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_28" name="" sourceRef="node_19" targetRef="node_23">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">selectlist.title == "La Leçon de ténèbres"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_30" name="" sourceRef="node_19" targetRef="node_24">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">selectlist.title != "La Leçon de ténèbres"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_31" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_33</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_35</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_37</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_33" name="" sourceRef="node_22" targetRef="node_31"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_35" name="" sourceRef="node_23" targetRef="node_31"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_37" name="" sourceRef="node_24" targetRef="node_31"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_2" name="Verify Conversational with Gateways" processRef="ProcessId"/>

  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">

config.name: Variable Name
config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.name: Data Type
config.label: Data Type
config.helper: The data type specifies what kind of data is stored in the variable.

config.name: Data Format
config.label: Data Format
config.helper: The data format for the selected type.

config.label: Validation Rules
config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.label: Custom Format String
config.helper:
Use the Mask Pattern format
Date ##/##/####
SSN ###-##-####
Phone (###) ###-####

config.label: CSS Selector Name
config.helper: Use this in your custom css rules

config.label: Aria Label
config.helper: Attribute designed to help assistive technology (e.g. screen readers) attach a label

config.label: Tab Order
config.helper: Order in which a user will move focus from one control to another by pressing the Tab key
